title: Geometric Diamond Pendant - A Contemporary Nakshi
materials: G-H Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting sheen.
features: Modern hexagonal design with layered geometric patterns. Center circle with pave-set diamonds, echoing traditional Nakshi work in a contemporary form. Open-work design for optimal light reflection and brilliance.
colors: Rose gold and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: or as a modern statement piece for formal gatherings.
description: A unique blend of modern geometric design and the enduring appeal of diamonds. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication. Its lightweight design makes it comfortable for daily wear while its sparkling diamonds ensure it makes a statement. Ideal for the modern woman who appreciates both tradition and contemporary style.
